issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: New android NDK "r11" is not detected by appc studio due to missing "ndk-gdb"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Download the latest NDK (r11, http://developer.android.com/ndk/downloads/index.html)
Try to put them in the studio setting

The file structure of the new NDK is different from the previous, which is probably why it breaks.


h3. Actual Result
Studio can't find the ndk-gdb file

h3. Expected Result
Studio must find it :)
fields.summary: Titanium Module Builder incompatible with new Android NDK R11

comments.body:
Unfortunately Android does not link older NDK downloads, but they can be found here:

http://web.archive.org/web/20150910022216/http://developer.android.com/ndk/downloads/index.html
